import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Transfer() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ senderAccount: "" }) function handleChange (event) { setFormData(prevFormData => { return { ...prevFormData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value } }) } function handleSubmit (event) { console.log(formData) } return (
